thread.title: Hershey’s Sales: Not So Sweet

author: Annie Gasparro
title: Hershey’s Sales: Not So Sweet
text:
Hershey Co. said sales volume fell 2.3% globally in the fourth quarter, hurt by a drop in its core North American chocolate business.
The maker of chocolate Kisses, Reese’s peanut butter cups and Twizzlers licorice has been reaching beyond candy in recent years to become a broader snacking company, but most of its earnings still come from its indulgent brands.
In...
